_sText:
SIEGE

Hostage Rescue map for Counter-Strike: Source

CS 1.6 original map creators: n0th1ng (Justin DeJong) & Valve
CS:GO map creators: 3Dnj (Valentin Levillain) & Moroes (Marc Bidoul)
CS:S map port creator: Niko
Navigation Mesh editor: Meurglis3

High-quality port for CS:S of CS:GO remake of awesome Counter-Strike 1.6 map. There are 3 Hostages in this mission and 1 large Rescue Zone (with two approaches).

Missions:
   Counter-Terrorists: Enter into the industrial complex and rescue the hostages.
   Terrorists: Prevent Counter-Terrorist force from rescuing the hostages.

Technical Notes:
   - Used Veretexing light on a map!
   - All particles are created on original engine, and maximum simulated original.

Additional Link: CS:GO map version
